segments.text: I notice the sunlight streaming through the window, casting a warm glow on the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, there's so much movement and yet an overwhelming stillness from the woman’s composure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink feels like a ticking time bomb; I'm surprised no one seems to be concerned about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how the simple act of drying dishes has turned into this chaotic scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing higher; I want to shout for him to be careful, but I hold back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He stretches for the cookies, seemingly unaware of the dangers beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s infectious excitement fills the space, despite the lurking hazards around them.
segments.speaker: PAR
